text: Motion
Motion
Motion

(...And then,
I'll send this email to the other party...)
(...Alright.)
...Phew!

Hey... Producer-san,
Are you done with work...?

Hm?
Ah, yeah.

Um...! If you have time,
There's a place I'd like you to come with me...
...Is that okay...?

Well,
I don't have any plans after this...

Oh, um! You know,
I have a talk show job next time, right...?!

That event allows freedom in clothing choices,
So I wanted to come up with my own outfit...

Producer-san...!
Could you come with me and give me your opinion...?
Ah, I see.

In that case, leave it to me.
A lot of people are looking forward to Amana's fashion.

Let's think of a coordinated outfit
that everyone will enjoy.

...
Yeah!
Hmm...
Looks like she's pondering.
Yeah.

The black outerwear she has now
Would go well with Amana's current clothes.

Since the last event was also black-themed,
Do you think going with white this time would be refreshing?

Hmm...
Yeah, that's a tough one...
Ah, then, let's set aside Amana's opinion for now.

If you were Amana's fan,
From that perspective, which one would you prefer to see?
I see...

In that case, white, maybe. Because
You'd probably want to see various outfits from Amana.

And, about that outfit,
It seems a bit difficult to match...

But with Amana's sense,
I'm sure she can coordinate it well.

Female fans might also
Be able to use it as a reference.

...!
Thank you...!
Alright, let's go with that!

Producer-san,
Thanks for coming with me today.

Thanks to you,
I think we can come up with a really nice outfit.
Haha, you're welcome.

Oh, yeah, earlier, Amana
Made an analogy like 'If I were your fan', right?
? Yeah.

Even without being told, I've been
Amana's fan from the start.

Y-Yeah...!
That's right... huh...!
